ygData.subject: Re: Bard spell question
ygData.msgSnippet: Selo s accelerano will not work in a zone that is classified as a dungeon. You re probably thinking just inside buildings. Spirit of Wolf cannot be cast down
ygData.messageBody:
Selo's accelerano will not work in a zone that is classified as a dungeon.
You're probably thinking just inside buildings. Spirit of Wolf cannot be
cast down under either although the effect will continue if it is cast just
outside and you enter.

Good Journey,

Sineras (Cazic-Thule)


-----Original Message-----
From: chlebek@... [mailto:chlebek@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 9:59 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bard spell question


From: chlebek@...



Last night I tried to cast Selo's in Paw and got the message that I must be
outside to cast this spell. Has this always been like this? I'd swear I had
done this many times before.

Taelin, Songweavers of Kelethin
